title: Explainable Object-Centric Anomaly Detection: the Role of Domain Knowledge
details: A Berti, U Jessen, WMP van der Aalst, D Fahland - 2024
abstract: Anomaly detection is used in process mining to identify behavior differing significantly from the other instances. However, providing actionable insights out of the raw scores is challenging. In this paper, we propose three methodologies for …

title: Amer (2024), Adversarial Variational Autoencoders to Extend and Improve Generative Model
details: L Nguyen, HI Abdalla, A Ali - 2024
abstract: Generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) has been advancing with many notable achievements like ChatGPT and Bard. The deep generative model (DGM) is a branch of GenAI, which is preeminent in generating raster data such as image and …
